text: The Tivoli-Neu is a football stadium in Innsbruck, Austria. It is the homeground of FC Wacker Innsbruck and the Swarco Raiders Tirol, an American Football team. The stadium was one venue of the UEFA Euro 2008. ==History== The Tivoli-Neu replaces the old Tivoli stadium which was closed down in 2004. Since the insolvency of FC Tirol in 2002 the stadium is used by FC Wacker Innsbruck, the follower of the old club. For the UEFA Euro 2008 the stadium was used for matches. It was temporarily expanded to a capacity of 30 000. ==Matches== === International matches=== * 25 April 2001 Austriaâ€“ Liechtenstein 2:0 (1:0) * 11 June 2003 Austria- Belarus 5:0 (1:0) * 28 April 2004 Austria- Luxemburg 4:1 (2:0) * 11 October 2006 Austria- Switzerland 2:1 (2:0) * 17 October 2007 Austria- Ivory Coast 3:2 (1:0) * 11 June 2008 Spain- Russia 4:1 (2:0) UEFA Euro 2008 * 14 June 2008 Sweden- Spain 1:2 (1:1)UEFA Euro 2008 * 18 June 2008 Russia - Sweden 2:0 (1:0)UEFA Euro 2008 * 10 October 2009 Austria- Lithuania 2:1 (1:0) * 28 May 2010 Spain- Saudia Arabia 3:2 ===International matches of FC Tirol === * 14 September 2000 FC Tirol Innsbruck - AC Fiorentina 3:1 (2:0) * 26 October 2000 FC Tirol Innsbruck - VfB Stuttgart 1:0 (0:0) * 22 August 2001 FC Tirol Innsbruck - Lokomotiv Moskau 1:0 (0:0) * 11 September 2001 FC Tirol Innsbruck - Viktoria Zizkov 1:0 (0:0) * 1 November 2001 FC Tirol Innsbruck - AC Fiorentina, 2:2 (1:2) Category:Football stadiums in Austria Category:Sport in Innsbruck Category:2000 establishments in Europe
title: Tivoli-Neu
